title: Builder Preferences
exportBackup: Save a backup of your entire journal history as a JSON file.
attentionFastDesc: Quick analysis. Best for simple changes.
attentionDeepDesc: In-depth analysis of the entire project. Slower, for complex features.
telemetryDesc: This records anonymous usage data to improve the product.
resetDesc: This will delete all your apps, chats, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
autoApproveDesc: Automatically apply AI proposals without confirmation.
autoFixDesc: Automatically ask Lumina to fix runtime errors.
memoryDesc: Enables semantic search and graph-based memory using Embedded SurrealDB. Data is stored locally in your browser (IndexedDB) for privacy. No external database configuration required.
learningModeDesc: AI will add detailed comments to explain the generated code.
failoverDesc: Define a prioritized list of models. If a request to the first model fails, Lumina will automatically try the next one in the list.
archContextDesc: Provide specific architectural rules (e.g., 'Always use Redux') to guide the AI. This is appended to every request.
